text: Johnny Handsome is a 1989 crime-drama movie. Ellen Barkin plays Sunny. Mickey Rourke plays the title character. Elizabeth McGovern plays Donna. Morgan Freeman plays A.Z. Drones. Forest Whitaker plays Steven Fisher. The movie was not a success at the box office. It was released on DVD in 2002 and Blu-ray in 2010. Category:American crime movies Category:American drama movies Category:1989 movies
title: Johnny Handsome
